sn38.9:1.3: “Yam kho, avuso, dukkhe annanam, dukkhasamudaye annanam, dukkhanirodhe annanam, dukkhanirodhagaminiya patipadaya annanam—
sn38.9:1.5: “Atthi panavuso, maggo atthi patipada, etissa avijjaya pahanaya”ti?
sn38.9:1.6: “Atthi kho, avuso, maggo atthi patipada, etissa avijjaya pahanaya”ti.
sn38.9:1.7: “Katamo panavuso, maggo katama patipada, etissa avijjaya pahanaya”ti?
sn38.9:1.8: “Ayameva kho, avuso, ariyo atthangiko maggo, etissa avijjaya pahanaya, seyyathidam—
sn38.9:1.10: Ayam kho, avuso, maggo ayam patipada, etissa avijjaya pahanaya”ti.
sn38.9:1.11: “Bhaddako, avuso, maggo bhaddika patipada, etissa avijjaya pahanaya.
